title: Start
body:
<<changeBackground 0x0000ff>>

<<set $doorCount to 2>>

You see {$doorCount} doors

<< if $doorCount is 2 >>
There are two doors, yay!
<< else  >>
There are not two doors. WTF?
<< endif >>

Want to try a shortcut?
-> Yes
    Good choice
-> No
    You mean yes? Good choice

Time to jump!

[[Jump]]

title: Jump
body:
Jon: Don't go to the right 


[[Go to the left|left]]
[[Go to the right|right]]
